author: Scott Jennings
title: Ohio Governor Signs "Constitutional Carry" Bill Into Law

sentence: Ohio's Mike DeWine became the latest GOP governor to dramatically roll back his state’s gun laws Monday when he signed a bill allowing all Ohioans 21 and older, who can legally purchase a gun, to carry a concealed firearm without a permit, training or background check.
